<p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2"
face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">196</font></p>    </td>
<td width="1%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" 
style="background:#CCEEFF;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:1.3%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>   </tr>
<tr>
<td width="23%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:23.04%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 10.0pt;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" 
face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">TOTAL</font></p>    </td>
<td width="3%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:3.26%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>
<td width="15%" valign="bottom" style="border:none;border-bottom:solid 
windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:15.66%;">
<p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2"
face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">212</font></p>    </td>
<td width="3%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:3.26%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>
<td width="15%" valign="bottom" style="border:none;border-bottom:solid 
windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:15.66%;">
<p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2"
face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">50</font></p>    </td>
<td width="3%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:3.26%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>
<td width="15%" valign="bottom" style="border:none;border-bottom:solid 
windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:15.66%;">
<p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2"
face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">78</font></p>    </td>
<td width="3%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:3.26%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>
<td width="15%" valign="bottom" style="border:none;border-bottom:solid 
windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:15.66%;">
<p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2"
face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">340</font></p>    </td>
<td width="1%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:1.3%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>   </tr>  </table>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">The Company does not operate mines, develop projects 
or conduct exploration. &nbsp;Franco-Nevada&#146;s business model is focused on 
managing and growing its portfolio of royalties and streams.&nbsp;The advantages
of this business model are:</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 38.15pt;text-
indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Symbol" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">&#183;</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Exposure to precious metals price 
optionality;</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 38.15pt;text-
indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Symbol" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">&#183;</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>A perpetual discovery option over 
large areas of geologically prospective lands with no additional cost other than
the initial investment;</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 38.15pt;text-
indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Symbol" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">&#183;</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Limited exposure to many of the risks
associated with operating companies;</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 38.15pt;text-
indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Symbol" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">&#183;</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>A free cash-flow business with 
limited cash calls;</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 38.15pt;text-
indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Symbol" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">&#183;</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>A high-margin business that can 
generate cash through the entire commodity cycle;</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 38.15pt;text-
indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Symbol" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">&#183;</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>A scalable and diversified business 
in which a large number of assets can be managed with a small stable overhead; 
and</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 38.15pt;text-
indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Symbol" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">&#183;</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>A forward-looking business in which 
management focuses on growth opportunities rather than operational or 
development issues.</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">Franco-Nevada&#146;s financial results in the short-
term are primarily tied to the price of commodities and the amount of production
from its portfolio of producing assets.&nbsp; From time to time, financial 
results are also supplemented by acquisitions of new producing assets.&nbsp; 
Over the longer-term, results are impacted by the availability of exploration
and development capital applied by other companies to expand or extend Franco-
Nevada&#146;s producing assets or to advance Franco-Nevada&#146;s advanced and 
exploration assets into production.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">Franco-Nevada has a long-term focus in making its 
investments and recognizes it is in a cyclical industry.&nbsp; Franco-Nevada has
historically operated by maintaining a strong balance sheet so that it can make 
investments during commodity cycle downturns.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">Franco-Nevada&#146;s shares are listed on the Toronto 
and New York stock exchanges under the symbol FNV.&nbsp; An investment in 
Franco-Nevada&#146;s shares is expected to provide investors with yield and 
exposure to gold price and exploration optionality while limiting exposure to 
many of the risks of operating companies. Since its IPO over eight years ago, 
Franco-Nevada has</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-
align:center;">3<a name="PB_3_120702_5796"></a></p>
<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade 
align="left" style="color:#010101;"></div>
</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='3',FILE='C:\JMS\109488\16-16099-1\task8056807\16099-1-mo-
01.htm',USER='109488',CD='Aug  9 00:27 2016' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">increased its dividend annually and its share price 
has outperformed the gold price and all relevant gold equity 
benchmarks.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font 
size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-
weight:bold;">Franco-Nevada&#146;s Relative Share Price 
Performance</font></b></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font 
size="2" face="Times New Roman"><img width="543" height="413" 
src="g160991mo01i001.jpg"></font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">HIGHLIGHTS</font></b></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Financial &#151; Three 
Months</font></b></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-
indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Symbol" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">&#183;</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>The Company earned 112,787 Gold
Equivalent Ounces (&#147;GEOs&#148;)<font size="1" style="font-
size:6.5pt;position:relative;top:-3.0pt;">1</font>&#160;compared to 83,040 GEOs 
in second quarter 2015, an increase of 35.8%;</p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-
indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Symbol" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">&#183;</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Revenue of $150.9 million was 
generated, an increase of 37.9% from the $109.4 million generated in second 
quarter 2015;</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="1" width="25%" noshade 
align="left" style="color:black;"></div>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .25in;"><font size="1" 
face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:6.5pt;position:relative;top:-
3.0pt;">1</font>&#160;&#160;GEOs include our gold, silver, platinum, palladium 
and other mineral assets. GEOs are estimated on a gross basis for NSR royalties 
and, in the case of stream ounces, before the payment of the per ounce 
contractual price paid by the Company. For NPI royalties, GEOs are calculated 
taking into account the NPI economics. Silver, platinum, palladium and other 
minerals were converted to GEOs by dividing associated revenue, which includes 
settlement adjustments, by the average gold price for the period. For average 
commodity prices used in the calculation of GEOs, please refer to average 
commodity price tables on pages&nbsp;8 and 20 of this MD&amp;A.</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .25in;"><font size="1" 
face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:6.5pt;position:relative;top:-
3.0pt;">2</font>&#160;Adjusted Net Income, Adjusted EBITDA and Margin are non-
IFRS financial measures with no standardized meaning under IFRS. For further 
information and a detailed reconciliation, please see pages&nbsp;35-38 of this 
MD&amp;A.</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-
align:center;">4<a name="PB_4_120820_2897"></a></p>
<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade 
align="left" style="color:#010101;"></div>
</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='4',FILE='C:\JMS\109488\16-16099-1\task8056807\16099-1-mo-
01.htm',USER='109488',CD='Aug  9 00:27 2016' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-
indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Symbol" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">&#183;</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Adjusted EBITDA<font size="1" 
style="font-size:6.5pt;position:relative;top:-3.0pt;">2</font>&#160;increased 
44.7% to $118.9 million, or $0.67 per share from $82.2 million or $0.53 per 
share in second quarter 2015;</p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-
indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Symbol" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">&#183;</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>The Company continued to maintain a 
strong Margin<font size="1" style="font-size:6.5pt;position:relative;top:-
3.0pt;">2</font>&#160;of 78.8% compared to 75.1% in second quarter 2015;</p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-
indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Symbol" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">&#183;</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Net income earned was $42.3 million, 
or $0.24 per share compared to net income of $21.6 million or $0.14 per share in
second quarter 2015;</p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-
indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Symbol" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">&#183;</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Adjusted Net Income<font size="1" 
style="font-size:6.5pt;position:relative;top:-3.0pt;">1</font>&#160;earned was 
$40.0 million, or $0.22 per share compared to $22.9 million or $0.15 per share 
in second quarter 2015;</p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-
indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Symbol" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">&#183;</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Operating cash-flow before changes in
non-cash assets and liabilities of $109.9 million was generated in the second 
quarter compared to $78.0 million in second quarter 2015; and</p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-
indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Symbol" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">&#183;</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Dividends paid totaled $39.3 million 
in the quarter which is a combination of cash and shares issued under the 
Company&#146;s dividend reinvestment plan.</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Financial &#151; Six 
Months</font></b></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-
indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Symbol" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">&#183;</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>The Company earned 219,408 GEOs 
compared to 168,121 GEOs in the same period in 2015, an increase of 30.5%;</p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-
indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Symbol" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">&#183;</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Revenue of $282.9 million was 
generated, an increase of 29.4% from the $218.6 million generated in first six 
months of 2015;</p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-
indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Symbol" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">&#183;</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Adjusted EBITDA<font size="1" 
style="font-size:6.5pt;position:relative;top:-3.0pt;">2 </font>increased 34.5% 
to $222.6 million, or $1.27 per share from $165.5 million or $1.06 per share in 
the same period in 2015;</p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-
indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Symbol" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">&#183;</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>The Company continued to maintain a 
strong Margin<font size="1" style="font-size:6.5pt;position:relative;top:-
3.0pt;">2</font>&#160;of 78.7% compared to 75.9% in 2015;</p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-
indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Symbol" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">&#183;</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Net income earned was $72.3 million, 
or $0.41 per share compared to net income of $40.8 million or $0.26 per share in
first six months of 2015;</p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-
indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Symbol" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">&#183;</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Adjusted Net Income<font size="1" 
style="font-size:6.5pt;position:relative;top:-3.0pt;">2</font>&#160;earned was 
$68.0 million, or $0.39 per share compared to $45.8 million or $0.30 per share 
in same period in 2015;</p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-
indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Symbol" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">&#183;</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Operating cash-flow before changes in
non-cash assets and liabilities of $209.3 million was generated in the first two
quarters of 2016 compared to $155.9 million in the same period in 2015; and</p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-
indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Symbol" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">&#183;</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Dividends totaled $77.8 million for 
the six months ended June&nbsp;30, 2016 which included cash dividends of $57.5 
million and $20.3 million in issued common shares under the Company&#146;s 
dividend reinvestment plan.</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Corporate</font></b></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">Castle Mountain</font></i></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">On June&nbsp;16, 2016, Franco-Nevada and NewCastle 
Gold Ltd. completed the restructuring of Franco-Nevada&#146;s existing royalties
at the Castle Mountain gold project in California, U.S. into a single 2.65% 
royalty covering a larger property.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">Antapaccay Precious Metals 
Stream</font></i></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">On February&nbsp;26, 2016, Franco-Nevada completed the
acquisition of a $500.0 million precious metals stream from Glencore plc with 
reference to production from the Antapaccay mine located in Peru. Under the 
stream agreement, gold and silver deliveries are initially</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="1" width="25%" noshade 
align="left" style="color:black;"></div>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .25in;"><font size="1" 
face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:6.5pt;position:relative;top:-
3.0pt;">1</font>&#160;&#160;Adjusted Net Income, Adjusted EBITDA and Margin are 
non-IFRS financial measures with no standardized meaning under IFRS. For further
information and a detailed reconciliation, please see pages&nbsp;35-38 of this
MD&amp;A.</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-
align:center;">5<a name="PB_5_121305_3020"></a></p>
<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade 
align="left" style="color:#010101;"></div>
</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='5',FILE='C:\JMS\109488\16-16099-1\task8056807\16099-1-mo-
01.htm',USER='109488',CD='Aug  9 00:27 2016' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">referenced to copper in concentrate shipped. The 
Company will receive 300 ounces of gold and 4,700 ounces of silver for each 
1,000 tonnes of copper in concentrate shipped, until 630,000 ounces of gold and 
10.0 million ounces of silver have been delivered. Thereafter, the Company will 
receive 30% of the gold and silver shipped. The Company will pay an on-going 
price of 20% of the spot price of gold and silver until 750,000 ounces of 
refined gold and 12.8 million ounces of refined silver have been delivered. 
Thereafter, the on-going price will increase to 30% of the spot price of gold 
and silver.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">Equity Financing</font></i></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">On February&nbsp;19, 2016, the Company completed a 
bought-deal financing with a syndicate of underwriters for 19.2 million common 
shares at $47.85 per common share. The net proceeds to the Company were $883.5 
million after deducting share issue costs and expenses of $36.6 
million.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">GUIDANCE</font></b></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">The following contains forward-looking statements 
about our guidance for 2016. Reference should be made to the &#147;Cautionary 
Statement on Forward Looking Information&#148; section at the end of this 
MD&amp;A. For a description of material factors that could cause our actual 
results to differ materially from the forward-looking statements below, please 
see the Cautionary Statement and the &#147;Risk Factors&#148; section of our 
most recent Annual Information Form&nbsp;filed with the Canadian securities 
regulatory authorities on www.sedar.com and our most recent Form&nbsp;40-F filed
with the Securities and Exchange Commission on www.sec.gov.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">Franco-Nevada realized record growth from its mineral 
assets for the first six months of 2016. Mineral assets contributed 219,408 GEOs
with $11.4 million in revenue from Franco-Nevada&#146;s oil&nbsp;&amp; gas 
assets for the first two quarters of 2016. For fiscal 2016, Franco-Nevada 
expects to receive GEOs from its mineral assets in the higher end of the 
previously announced guidance range of 425,000 to 445,000 GEOs.&#160; In 
addition, the Company confirms its previous revenue guidance range for 
Oil&nbsp;&amp; Gas of $15.0 million to $25.0 million. Of the 425,000 to 445,000
GEOs, Franco-Nevada expects to receive 295,000 to 305,000 GEOs under its various
stream agreements compared to 222,670 GEOs received for full year 
2015.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">In forecasting GEOs for the remainder of 2016, gold, 
silver, platinum and palladium metals have been converted to GEOs using 
commodity prices of $1,325/oz Au, $19.50/oz Ag, $1,050/oz Pt and $600/oz 
Pd.&#160; For 2016, the WTI oil price is assumed to average $35 per barrel with 
a $3.50 per barrel price differential for Canadian oil.&#160; 2016 guidance 
assumes the continued steady state of operations from our assets.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">The Company funded $37.7 million towards the Cobre 
Panama precious metals stream in second quarter 2016 and has now funded $376 
million of the $1 billion commitment.&#160; The Company expects to fund 
approximately $120.0 million to $140.0 million in 2016 of which $35-$45 million 
will be funded in third quarter 2016.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">In addition, for 2016, the Company estimates depletion
and depreciation expense to be approximately $250.0 million to $275.0 
million.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-
align:center;">6<a name="PB_6_121323_7748"></a></p>
<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade 
align="left" style="color:#010101;"></div>
</div>

<td width="2%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF"

align="left" style="color:black;"></div>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .25in;text-
indent:-.25in;"><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:6.5pt;position:relative;top:-3.0pt;">1</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Impairments include impairment 
charges on investments, royalties, streams and working interests.</p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .25in;text-
indent:-.25in;"><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:6.5pt;position:relative;top:-3.0pt;">2</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>For average commodity prices 
used in calculation of GEOs, please refer to average commodity price tables on 
pages&nbsp;8 and 20 of this MD&amp;A.</p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .25in;text-
indent:-.25in;"><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:6.5pt;position:relative;top:-3.0pt;">3</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Adjusted EBITDA, Margin and 
Adjusted Net Income are non-IFRS financial measures with no standardized meaning
under IFRS. For further information and a detailed reconciliation, please see 
pages&nbsp;35-38 of this MD&amp;A.</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-
align:center;">7<a name="PB_7_122444_3086"></a></p>

align="left" style="color:#010101;"></div>

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">OVERVIEW OF FINANCIAL PERFORMANCE 
&#151; Q2 2016 TO Q2 2015</font></b></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">The prices of precious metals, oil&nbsp;&amp; gas and 
the actual production from mineral and oil&nbsp;&amp; gas assets are the largest
factors in determining profitability and cash flow from operations for Franco-
Nevada.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Average Commodity Prices and Exchange
Rate</font></b></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" width="100%" style="border-
collapse:collapse;">
<tr>
<td width="24%" valign="bottom" style="border:none;border-bottom:solid 
windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:24.5%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:8.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Quarterly&nbsp;Averages</font></b></p>
</td>
<td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.0%;">
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font 
size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;font-
weight:bold;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>    </td>
<td width="10%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:10.0%;">
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font 
size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;font-
weight:bold;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>    </td>
<td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.0%;">
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font 
size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;font-
weight:bold;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>    </td>
<td width="10%" colspan="2" valign="bottom" style="border:none;border-
bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:10.0%;">
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font 
size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:8.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Q2<br>
2016</font></b></p>    </td>
<td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.0%;">
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font 
size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;font-
weight:bold;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>    </td>
<td width="10%" colspan="2" valign="bottom" style="border:none;border-
bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:10.0%;">
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font 
size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:8.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Q1<br>
2016</font></b></p>    </td>
<td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.0%;">
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font 
size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;font-
weight:bold;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>    </td>
<td width="10%" colspan="2" valign="bottom" style="border:none;border-
bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:10.0%;">
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font

style="background:#CCEEFF;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.5%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">)%</font></p>    </td>   </tr>
<tr height="0">
<td width="173" style="border:none;"></td>
<td width="14" style="border:none;"></td>
<td width="71" style="border:none;"></td>
<td width="14" style="border:none;"></td>
<td width="8" style="border:none;"></td>
<td width="63" style="border:none;"></td>
<td width="14" style="border:none;"></td>
<td width="8" style="border:none;"></td>
<td width="63" style="border:none;"></td>
<td width="14" style="border:none;"></td>
<td width="8" style="border:none;"></td>
<td width="63" style="border:none;"></td>
<td width="18" style="border:none;"></td>
<td width="71" style="border:none;"></td>
<td width="18" style="border:none;"></td>
<td width="71" style="border:none;"></td>
<td width="18" style="border:none;"></td>   </tr> </table>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="1" width="25%" noshade 
align="left" style="color:black;"></div>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .25in;text-
indent:-.25in;"><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:6.5pt;position:relative;top:-3.0pt;">1</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Based on London Bullion Market 
Association (&#147;LBMA&#148;) Gold Price PM</p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .25in;text-
indent:-.25in;"><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:6.5pt;position:relative;top:-3.0pt;">2</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Based on LBMA Silver Price</p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .25in;text-
indent:-.25in;"><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:6.5pt;position:relative;top:-3.0pt;">3</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Based on London PM Fix</p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .25in;text-
indent:-.25in;"><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:6.5pt;position:relative;top:-3.0pt;">4</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Based on Bank of Canada noon 
rates</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">Precious metals commodity prices have been in a 
volatile and declining state for an extended period of time with prices only 
recently beginning to recover. The gold price has increased approximately 25% 
since the beginning of the year.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">During the second quarter of 2016, average gold prices
traded between $1,213/oz and $1,325/oz with an average price of $1,259/oz. This 
compares to an average gold price of $1,193/oz for the second quarter of 2015, 
an increase of 5.5%, and $1,181/oz for the first quarter of 2016.&#160; 
Historically, the price of gold has been subject to volatile price movements 
over short periods of time and is affected by numerous macroeconomic and 
industry factors that are beyond the Company&#146;s control. Major influences on
the gold price include macroeconomic factors such as the level of interest rates
and inflation expectations as well as currency exchange rate fluctuations and 
the relative strength of the U.S. dollar and the supply of and demand for 
gold.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">During second quarter 2016, platinum and palladium 
prices averaged $1,004/oz and $568/oz compared to $1,127/oz and $760/oz for the 
second quarter of 2015, decreases of 10.9% and 25.3%, respectively.&#160; Silver
prices averaged $17.17/oz for second quarter compared to $16.41/oz in second 
quarter 2015.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">Commodity price volatility not only impacts overall 
revenues but also impacts the number of GEOs contributed by non-gold assets when
converting from silver, platinum, palladium and other minerals to gold 
equivalent ounces.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">Despite the volatile commodity prices, our mineral 
assets continued to deliver strong results as the mineral assets performed well 
delivering a significant increase in GEOs over the prior year.&#160; One of the 
strengths of the Franco-Nevada business model is that our business is not 
impacted when producer costs increase. Royalty and stream payments/deliveries 
are based on production levels of the underlying operations with no adjustments 
for the operator&#146;s operating costs, with the exception of NPI royalties 
which are based on the profit of the</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-
align:center;">8<a name="PB_8_123342_7056"></a></p>
<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade 
align="left" style="color:#010101;"></div>
</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='8',FILE='C:\JMS\109488\16-16099-1\task8056807\16099-1-mo-
03.htm',USER='109488',CD='Aug  9 00:28 2016' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">underlying mining operation. During the quarter, NPI 
royalties accounted for approximately 4% of total revenues.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font 
size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">GEO 
Production Growth</font></b></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font 
size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font 
size="2" face="Times New Roman"><img width="674" height="358" 
src="g160991mo03i001.jpg"></font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">Gold Equivalent 
Ounces and Revenue</font></i></b></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">Franco-Nevada&#146;s revenue is generated from various
forms of agreements, ranging from NSR royalties, streams, NPI royalties, net 
royalty interests (&#147;NRI&#148;), working interests and other. <i>For
definitions of the various types of agreements, please refer to our most recent 
Annual Information Form&nbsp;filed on SEDAR at www.sedar.com or our 
Form&nbsp;40-F filed on EDGAR at www.sec.gov</i>.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">Franco-Nevada continued to see significant growth in 
GEOs with mineral assets contributing 112,787 GEOs in the second quarter of 
2016, an increase of 35.8% over the second quarter of 2015.&#160; Revenue for 
the quarter was $150.9 million compared with $109.4 million for the same period 
of 2015, an increase of 37.9%.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">The impact on revenue earned by the growth in the 
number of GEOs received was further enhanced by higher average gold and silver 
prices in second quarter 2016 compared to prior year.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-
align:center;">9<a name="PB_9_123427_5335"></a></p>
<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade 
align="left" style="color:#010101;"></div>
</div>

<td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>
<td width="10%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:10.0%;">

align="left" style="color:black;"></div>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .25in;text-
indent:-.25in;"><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:6.5pt;position:relative;top:-3.0pt;">1</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>For average commodity prices 
used in the calculation of GEOs, please refer to average commodity price tables 
on pages&nbsp;8 and 20 of this MD&amp;A.</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">GEOs and revenue were earned from the following asset 
classes:</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">For the three months ended 
June&nbsp;30,</font></b></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

align="left" style="color:black;"></div>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .25in;text-
indent:-.25in;"><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:6.5pt;position:relative;top:-3.0pt;">1</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>For average commodity prices 
used in calculation of GEOs, please refer to average commodity price tables on 
pages&nbsp;8 and 20 of this MD&amp;A.</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Our portfolio is well-diversified with GEOs
and revenue </font>being earned from 43 mineral assets and 59 oil&nbsp;&amp; gas
interests in various jurisdictions.</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-
align:center;">10<a name="PB_10_123759_5796"></a></p>
<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade 
align="left" style="color:#010101;"></div>
</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='10',FILE='C:\JMS\109488\16-16099-1\task8056807\16099-1-mo-
03.htm',USER='109488',CD='Aug  9 00:28 2016' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font 
size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">GEO 
Reconciliation &#151; Q2 2015 to Q2 2016</font></b></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font 
size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font 
size="2" face="Times New Roman"><img width="661" height="366" 
src="g160991mo03i002.jpg"></font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font 
size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">GEOs earned from precious metal assets increased by 
37.8% to 111,300 GEOs in the second quarter of 2016 from 80,742 GEOs in the 
second quarter of 2015. Revenue from precious metal assets was $141.2 million in
the second quarter of 2016 compared with $96.4 million for the same period as 
2015. The largest component of these increases was contributed from our Latin
America assets which realized a 62.0% increase in GEOs and 71.3% increase in 
revenue compared to the prior year as a result of the acquisitions of the 
Antamina and Antapaccay streams.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-
align:center;">11<a name="PB_11_123839_2897"></a></p>
<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade 
align="left" style="color:#010101;"></div>
</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='11',FILE='C:\JMS\109488\16-16099-1\task8056807\16099-1-mo-
03.htm',USER='109488',CD='Aug  9 00:28 2016' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font 
size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-
weight:bold;">Quarterly Revenue Breakdown</font></b></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><i><font 
size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-
style:italic;">(expressed in millions)</font></i></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font 
size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font 
size="2" face="Times New Roman"><img width="583" height="365" 
src="g160991mo03i003.jpg"></font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font 
size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">Overall, GEOs and revenue increases for the quarter 
are attributable to the following:</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-
indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Symbol" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">&#183;</font>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The Company received 
19,581 GEO deliveries from Antapaccay, a stream added in first quarter 
2016.&#160; Second quarter 2016 represented the first full quarter of deliveries
from the asset.</p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-
indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Symbol" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">&#183;</font>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The Company received 
11,898 GEO deliveries from Antamina, an asset added to the portfolio in fourth 
quarter 2015.</p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-
indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Symbol" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">&#183;</font>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The Company received 
its first full quarter of deliveries from Karma with 2,500 gold ounces being 
received.&#160; Deliveries from Karma are fixed in the initial years at a rate 
of 1,250 ounces per month. Due to timing of deliveries, the Company expects to 
receive 5,000 gold ounces in third quarter 2016.</p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-
indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Symbol" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">&#183;</font>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Our Sudbury precious 
metals assets delivered an additional 1,979 GEOs compared to second quarter 
2015.&#160; This increase is due to higher platinum and palladium production at 
the mines partially offset by lower gold, platinum and palladium prices on the 
conversion to GEOs.</p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-
indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Symbol" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">&#183;</font>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Goldstrike delivered an
additional 3,211 GEOs compared to second quarter 2015 which consists of both
higher NSR and NPI ounces.</p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-
indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Symbol" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">&#183;</font>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The above significant 
increase in GEOs were partially offset by lower GEO deliveries from Candelaria 
(-7,945 GEOs) where lower deliveries were expected in 2016, Bald Mountain (-
1,391 GEOs) and Stillwater (-1,077 GEOs) in the quarter.</p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-
indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Symbol" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">&#183;</font>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;During the second 
quarter of 2016, 1,385,191 ounces of silver were delivered from our Candelaria, 
Antapaccay, Antamina and Cerro San Pedro interests which were converted to 
GEOs.</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Other Minerals generated </font>1,487 GEOs 
and $1.9 million in revenue.</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-
align:center;">12<a name="PB_12_123917_3020"></a></p>
<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade 
align="left" style="color:#010101;"></div>
</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='12',FILE='C:\JMS\109488\16-16099-1\task8056807\16099-1-mo-
03.htm',USER='109488',CD='Aug  9 00:28 2016' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">Oil&nbsp;&amp; gas assets generated revenue of $7.8 
million for the quarter (99% oil and 1% gas) compared with $10.3 million for the
same period of 2015 (97% oil and 3% gas), a decrease of 24.3%. The decrease is 
largely due to lower average oil prices realized in the second quarter of 2016. 
Production for the quarter was 3.2% lower than the second quarter of 
2015.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">Revenue from the Weyburn Unit for the quarter 
decreased to $6.7 million (2015 - $ 8.3 million) with $4.4 million earned from 
the NRI (2015 - $5.3 million), $2.0 million earned from the working interest 
(2015 - $2.5 million) and $0.3 million earned from the overriding royalties 
(2015 - $0.5 million). Revenue from the Weyburn NRI was lower due to the 
decrease in the average oil price.&#160; Actual realized price from the NRI was 
C$46.48/boe for the quarter, down 22.8% from the realized price of C$60.17/boe 
for the second quarter of 2015.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-
align:center;">13<a name="PB_13_123928_7748"></a></p>
<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade 
align="left" style="color:#010101;"></div>
</div>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">Revenue for the three and six months ended 
June&nbsp;30, 2016 was $150.9 million (2015 - $109.4 million) and $282.9 million
(2015 - $218.6 million), respectively, and was comprised of the 
following:</font></p>

<p align="center" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-
align:center;">14<a name="PB_14_121118_2330"></a></p>
<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade 
align="left" style="color:#010101;"></div>

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='14',FILE='C:\JMS\109206\16-16099-1\task8057016\16099-1-mo-
05.htm',USER='109206',CD='Aug  9 02:14 2016' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">As stated earlier, two of the Company&#146;s primary 
objectives are to build a diversified portfolio of royalties and streams by 
commodity, geography, revenue type and stage of project and maintain precious 
metals revenue above 80% of total revenue.&nbsp; For the second quarter of 2016,
precious metals revenue comprised 94% of total revenue compared to 88% in second
quarter 2015.&#160; In addition, the Company generated 84% of revenue from 
jurisdictions in the Americas, with a long history of mining.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Revenue by Commodity - Three Months 
ending June 30th</font></b></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font 
size="2" face="Times New Roman"><img width="480" height="326" 
src="g160991mo05i001.jpg"></font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Revenue by Geography - Three Months 
ending June 30th</font></b></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font 
size="2" face="Times New Roman"><img width="480" height="414" 
src="g160991mo05i002.jpg"></font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">Costs and 
Expenses</font></i></b></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">Costs and expenses for the second quarter were $101.9 
million compared to $78.5 million in the same period in 2015. The following 
table provides a list of the costs and expenses incurred for the three months 
ended June&nbsp;30, 2016 and 2015.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

collapse:collapse;margin-left:.5in;">

<td width="1%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF"

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">Costs of Sales</font></i></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">Costs of sales, which are comprised of the cost of 
GEOs purchased under stream agreements, cost of prepaid gold ounces, net 
proceeds taxes on mineral interests, oil&nbsp;&amp; gas production taxes and 
operating costs on oil&nbsp;&amp; gas working interests were $27.7 million for 
the second quarter of 2016 compared with $24.0 million for the second quarter of
2015.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

collapse:collapse;margin-left:.5in;">

style="font-size:10.0pt;">)</font></p>    </td>   </tr>

<td width="48%" valign="top" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" 
style="background:#CCEEFF;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:48.64%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 10.0pt;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" 
face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>
<td width="2%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" 
style="background:#CCEEFF;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.88%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>
<td width="1%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" 
style="background:#CCEEFF;border:none;border-bottom:double windowtext 
2.25pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:1.3%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">$</font></p>    </td>
<td width="12%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" 
style="background:#CCEEFF;border:none;border-bottom:double windowtext 
2.25pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:12.54%;">
<p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2"
face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">27.7</font></p>    </td>
<td width="2%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" 
style="background:#CCEEFF;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.88%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>
<td width="1%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" 
style="background:#CCEEFF;border:none;border-bottom:double windowtext 
2.25pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:1.3%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">$</font></p>    </td>
<td width="12%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" 
style="background:#CCEEFF;border:none;border-bottom:double windowtext 
2.25pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:12.54%;">
<p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2"
face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">24.0</font></p>    </td>
<td width="2%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" 
style="background:#CCEEFF;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.88%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>
<td width="1%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" 
style="background:#CCEEFF;border:none;border-bottom:double windowtext 
2.25pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:1.3%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">$</font></p>    </td>
<td width="12%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" 
style="background:#CCEEFF;border:none;border-bottom:double windowtext 
2.25pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:12.54%;">
<p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2"
face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">3.7</font></p>    </td>
<td width="1%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" 
style="background:#CCEEFF;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:1.16%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>   </tr>  </table>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">The increase of $3.7 million is attributable to more 
stream ounces delivered pursuant to the various stream agreements in the second 
quarter of 2016 when compared to 2015.&#160; The</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-
align:center;">15<a name="PB_15_121756_5226"></a></p>
<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade 
align="left" style="color:#010101;"></div>
</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='15',FILE='C:\JMS\109206\16-16099-1\task8057016\16099-1-mo-
05.htm',USER='109206',CD='Aug  9 02:14 2016' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">ongoing stream cost per ounces are either a fixed 
amount per ounce delivered (adjusted for inflation each year) or an amount based
as a percentage of spot price of gold or silver. The Company was delivered 
81,180 GEOs under its stream agreements during second quarter 2016 compared to 
52,905 GEOs delivered in second quarter 2015.&#160; Oil&nbsp;&amp; gas operating
costs were lower due to production and cost efficiencies implemented by the 
operators.</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font 
size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font 
size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Costs
of Sales Reconciliation &#151; Q2 2015 to Q2 2016</font></b></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><i><font 
size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-
style:italic;">(expressed in millions)</font></i></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font 
size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font 
size="2" face="Times New Roman"><img width="670" height="346" 
src="g160991mo05i003.jpg"></font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font 
size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">Depletion and 
Depreciation</font></i></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">Depletion and depreciation totaled $68.2 million for 
the quarter compared to $49.1 million in 2015. The majority of the increase of 
$19.1 million is due to the increased depletion associated with the two 
significant stream acquisitions completed by the Company in the last 12 
months.&#160; During the quarter, the Company recorded $11.9 million in 
depletion for Antapaccay and $8.0 million for Antamina.&#160; In addition, $1.7 
million incremental depletion for Goldstrike was recorded due to higher 
production and the Company recorded $2.1 million in depletion for Karma where 
initial deliveries were received.&#160; These increases were partially offset by
lower depletion on Candelaria and Bald Mountain due to lower production and
Oil&nbsp;&amp; gas due to the impact of a weaker Canadian dollar relative to the
U.S. dollar.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-
align:center;">16<a name="PB_16_121933_7056"></a></p>
<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade 
align="left" style="color:#010101;"></div>
</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='16',FILE='C:\JMS\109206\16-16099-1\task8057016\16099-1-mo-
05.htm',USER='109206',CD='Aug  9 02:14 2016' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font 
size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-
weight:bold;">Depletion Reconciliation &#151; Q2 2015 to Q2 2016</font></b></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><i><font 
size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-
style:italic;">(expressed in millions)</font></i></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font 
size="2" face="Times New Roman"><img width="716" height="355" 
src="g160991mo05i004.jpg"></font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font 
size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">Corporate 
Administration</font></i></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">Corporate administration expenses increased to $5.7 
million in the quarter, representing 3.8% of revenue, compared to $4.1 million 
in 2015. The increase is primarily due to higher board of directors&#146; costs 
as the deferred share units earned by board members increased in value during 
the quarter.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">Business Development 
Expenses</font></i></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">Business development expenses reflected an expense of 
$0.3 million due to the capitalization of expenses to the mineral interest 
following the closing of transactions. Timing of incurring these costs typically
varies depending upon the level of activity of the business development team and
the timing of completing transactions.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-
align:center;">17<a name="PB_17_122152_5335"></a></p>
<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade 
align="left" style="color:#010101;"></div>
</div>

05.htm',USER='109206',CD='Aug  9 02:14 2016' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Foreign Exchange and Other 
Income/Expenses</font></b></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"
style="font-size:10.0pt;">Foreign exchange gains and other income/expenses were 
an income of $4.4 million for Q2 2016 compared to an income of $1.4 million for 
Q2 2015. The following table provides a list of foreign exchange income and 
other income/expenses incurred for the three months ended June&nbsp;30, 2016 and
2015.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
