<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 10.0pt;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" 
face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Gain on sale of 
investments</font></p>    </td>
<td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.88%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>
<td width="13%" colspan="2" valign="bottom" style="border:none;border-
bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:13.84%;">
<p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2"
face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">2.8</font></p>    </td>
<td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.88%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>
<td width="13%" colspan="2" valign="bottom" style="border:none;border-
bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:13.84%;">
<p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2"
face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">0.9</font></p>    </td>
<td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.88%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>
<td width="13%" colspan="2" valign="bottom" style="border:none;border-
bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:13.84%;">
<p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2"
face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.9</font></p>    </td>
<td width="1%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:1.16%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>   </tr>
<tr>
<td width="48%" valign="top" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" 
style="background:#CCEEFF;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:48.64%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 10.1pt;text-indent:-10.1pt;"><font size="2" 
face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>
<td width="2%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" 
style="background:#CCEEFF;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.88%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>
<td width="1%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" 
style="background:#CCEEFF;border:none;border-bottom:double windowtext 
2.25pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:1.3%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">$</font></p>    </td>
<td width="12%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" 
style="background:#CCEEFF;border:none;border-bottom:double windowtext 
2.25pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:12.54%;">
<p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2"
face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">4.4</font></p>    </td>
<td width="2%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" 
style="background:#CCEEFF;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.88%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>
<td width="1%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" 
style="background:#CCEEFF;border:none;border-bottom:double windowtext 
2.25pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:1.3%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">$</font></p>    </td>
<td width="12%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" 
style="background:#CCEEFF;border:none;border-bottom:double windowtext 
2.25pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:12.54%;">
<p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2"
face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.4</font></p>    </td>
<td width="2%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" 
style="background:#CCEEFF;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.88%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>
<td width="1%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" 
style="background:#CCEEFF;border:none;border-bottom:double windowtext 
2.25pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:1.3%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">$</font></p>    </td>
<td width="12%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" 
style="background:#CCEEFF;border:none;border-bottom:double windowtext 
2.25pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:12.54%;">
<p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2"
face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">3.0</font></p>    </td>
<td width="1%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" 
style="background:#CCEEFF;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:1.16%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>   </tr>  </table>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"
style="font-size:10.0pt;">Foreign exchange gains and losses include foreign 
exchange movements related to cash and cash equivalents and investments in debt 
securities, such as treasury bills and intercompany loans, held in the parent 
company, which are denominated in either U.S. dollars or Mexican pesos. The 
parent company&#146;s functional currency is the Canadian dollar. Under IFRS, 
all foreign exchange changes related to monetary assets denominated in a 
currency other than the functional currency are recorded in net income as 
opposed to other comprehensive income. The gain on sale of gold relates to 
physical ounces of gold sold from royalty interests.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Finance Income and Finance 
Expenses</font></b></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">Finance income was $1.0 million (2015 - $1.1 million) 
for the quarter while finance expenses were $0.8 million (2015 - $0.5 
million).</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font 
size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" width="86%" style="border-
collapse:collapse;margin-left:.5in;">

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">Finance income is earned on our cash equivalents 
and/or short-term investments. Interest income in the amount of $0.5 million was
accrued from the Noront loan during Q2 2016.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Income Taxes</font></b></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">Franco-Nevada had an income tax expense of $11.3 
million (2015 &#150;$11.3 million) for the quarter comprised of a current income
tax expense of $11.6 million (2015 - $6.1 million) and a deferred income tax 
recovery of $0.3 million (2015 &#150; deferred income tax expense of $5.2 
million) related to our Canadian and Mexican entities.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Net Income</font></b></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">Net income for the quarter was $42.3 million, or $0.24
per share, compared with a net income of $21.6 million, or $0.14 per share, for 
the same period in 2015. Adjusted Net Income was $40.0 million, or $0.22 per 
share, compared with $22.9 million, or $0.15 per</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-
align:center;">18<a name="PB_18_123023_2815"></a></p>
<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade 
align="left" style="color:#010101;"></div>

<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">share, for Q2 2015.&#160; The increase in Adjusted Net
Income was driven primarily by higher revenue due to the recent asset 
acquisitions.</font></p>

align="left" style="color:black;"></div>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .25in;text-
indent:-.25in;"><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:6.5pt;position:relative;top:-3.0pt;">1</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Includes impairment charges on 
royalty, stream and working interests.</p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .25in;text-
indent:-.25in;"><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:6.5pt;position:relative;top:-3.0pt;">2</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>GEOs, Adjusted EBITDA, Margin 
and Adjusted Net Income are non-IFRS measures with no standardized meaning under
IFRS. For further information and a detailed reconciliation, please refer to 
pages&nbsp;35-38 of this MD&amp;A.</p>

style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

align:center;">19<a name="PB_19_123014_7228"></a></p>

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">OVERVIEW OF FINANCIAL PERFORMANCE 
&#151; SIX MONTHS 2016 TO SIX MONTHS 2015</font></b></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">The prices of precious metals, oil and gas and the 
actual production from mineral and oil&nbsp;&amp; gas assets are the largest 
factors in determining profitability and cash flow from operations for Franco-
Nevada.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Average Commodity Prices and Exchange
Rate</font></b></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="1" width="25%" noshade 
align="left" style="color:black;"></div>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .25in;text-
indent:-.25in;"><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:6.5pt;position:relative;top:-3.0pt;">1</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Based on London Bullion Market 
Association (&#147;LBMA&#148;) Gold Price PM</p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .25in;text-
indent:-.25in;"><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:6.5pt;position:relative;top:-3.0pt;">2</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Based on LBMA Silver Price</p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .25in;text-
indent:-.25in;"><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:6.5pt;position:relative;top:-3.0pt;">3</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Based on London PM Fix</p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .25in;text-
indent:-.25in;"><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:6.5pt;position:relative;top:-3.0pt;">4</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Based on Bank of Canada noon 
rates</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">Precious metals commodity prices have largely declined
in recent years and have only recently started to recover.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">During the first six months of 2016, average gold 
prices traded between $1,077/oz and $1,366/oz with an average price of 
$1,220/oz. This compares to an average gold price of $1,206/oz for the six 
months ended June&nbsp;30, 2015.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">Gold Equivalent 
Ounces and Revenue</font></i></b></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">Franco-Nevada continued to see significant growth in 
GEOs contributed with mineral assets contributing 219,408 GEOs in the first half
of 2016, an increase of 30.5% over the first half of 2015.&#160; Revenue for the
period was $282.9 million compared with $218.6 million for the same period of
2015, an increase of 29.4%. Although the number of GEOs contributed grew, lower 
average silver, platinum and palladium prices reduced the overall positive 
impact of this increase on revenue.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">The following table outlines GEOs and revenue 
attributable to Franco-Nevada for the six months ended June&nbsp;30, 2016 and 
2015 by commodity, geographical location and type of interest:</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-
align:center;">20<a name="PB_20_124036_3020"></a></p>
<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade 
align="left" style="color:#010101;"></div>
</div>

align="left" style="color:black;"></div>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .25in;text-
indent:-.25in;"><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:6.5pt;position:relative;top:-3.0pt;">1</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>For average commodity prices
used in the calculation of GEOs, please refer to average commodity price tables 
on pages&nbsp;8 and 20 of this MD&amp;A.</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">GEOs and revenue were earned from the following asset 
classes:</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">For the six months ended 
June&nbsp;30,</font></b></p>

style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>
<td width="10%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" 
style="background:#CCEEFF;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:10.0%;">
<p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><i><font 
size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-
style:italic;">51,964</font></i></p>    </td>
<td width="2%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" 
style="background:#CCEEFF;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.0%;">

style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>
<td width="1%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" 
style="background:#CCEEFF;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:1.12%;">

style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">$</font></b></p>    </td>
<td width="8%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" 
style="background:#CCEEFF;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:8.88%;">

size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-

<p align="center" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-
align:center;">21<a name="PB_21_124519_7748"></a></p>

align="left" style="color:#010101;"></div>

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='21',FILE='C:\JMS\109488\16-16099-1\task8056807\16099-1-mo-
07.htm',USER='109488',CD='Aug  9 00:32 2016' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">GEO Reconciliation &#151; Six Months 
2015 to Six Months 2016</font></b></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font 
size="2" face="Times New Roman"><img width="624" height="330" 
src="g160991mo07i001.jpg"></font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">GEOs earned from precious metal assets increased by 
31.7% to 215,876 GEOs in 2016 from 163,912 GEOs in 2015. Revenue from precious 
metal assets was $267.1 million in 2016 compared with $197.8 million for the 
same period as 2015. The largest increase came from our Latin American 
assets.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">Overall, GEOs and revenue increases are attributable 
to the following:</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-
indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Symbol" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">&#183;</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>The Company received 28,499 GEO 
deliveries from Antapaccay. This includes 371,000 silver ounces delivered and 
sold by the Company.&#160; This is a new asset for 2016.</p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-
indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Symbol" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">&#183;</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>The Company received 29,679 GEO 
deliveries from Antamina for the first six months of 2016.</p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-
indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Symbol" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">&#183;</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>The new stream Karma has delivered 
three months of fixed ounces thus far in 2016 accounting for 3,750 GEOs.</p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-
indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Symbol" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">&#183;</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>The Company benefited from the Hemlo 
NPI contributing an additional 1,559 GEOs in 2016 compared to 2015 due to higher
gold prices and stronger production.</p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-
indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Symbol" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">&#183;</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Goldstrike delivered an additional 
5,752 GEOs compared to the first six months of 2015 which consists of both 
higher NSR and NPI ounces.</p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-
indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Symbol" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">&#183;</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>The above significant increases in 
GEOs were partially offset by lower GEO deliveries from Candelaria (-11,024 
GEOs) where lower deliveries were expected in 2016, Bald Mountain (-2,941 GEOs) 
and Stillwater (-2,344 GEOs) in the first six months of 2016.</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-
align:center;">22<a name="PB_22_124644_141"></a></p>
<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade 
align="left" style="color:#010101;"></div>
</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='22',FILE='C:\JMS\109488\16-16099-1\task8056807\16099-1-mo-
07.htm',USER='109488',CD='Aug  9 00:32 2016' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-
indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Symbol" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">&#183;</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>During the six months ended 
June&nbsp;30, 2016, 3,132,933 ounces of silver were delivered from Candelaria, 
Antapaccay, Antamina and Cerro San Pedro interests which were converted to 
GEOs.</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Other Minerals generated </font>3,532 GEOs 
and $4.4 million in revenue.</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">Oil&nbsp;&amp; gas assets generated revenue of $11.4 
million for the first six months of 2016 (98% oil and 2% gas) compared with 
$15.8 million for 2015 (95% oil and 5% gas), a decrease of 27.8%. The decrease 
is due to lower average oil prices realized in 2016. Production for the six 
months was 3.7% lower than for the same period in 2015.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">Revenue from the Weyburn Unit for the period decreased
to $9.0 million (2015 - $ 11.7 million) with $5.3 million earned from the NRI 
(2015 - $6.8 million), $3.2 million earned from the working interest (2015 - 
$4.2 million) and $0.5 million earned from the overriding royalties (2015 - $0.7
million). Revenue from the Weyburn NRI was lower due to the decrease in the 
average oil price. Actual realized price from the NRI was C$40.18/boe for the 
period, down 23.5% from the realized price of C$52.53/boe for the first half of 
2015.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">For the six months ended June&nbsp;30, 2016, precious 
metals revenue was 94% of total revenue compared to 91% in 2015.&#160; In 
addition, the Company generated 83% of revenue from the Americas.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Revenue by Commodity - Six Months 
ending June 30th</font></b></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font 
size="2" face="Times New Roman"><img width="480" height="326" 
src="g160991mo09i001.jpg"></font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Revenue by Geography - Six Months 
ending June 30th</font></b></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font 
size="2" face="Times New Roman"><img width="480" height="413" 
src="g160991mo09i002.jpg"></font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">Costs and 
Expenses</font></i></b></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">Costs and expenses for the six months ended 
June&nbsp;30, 2016 were $197.5 million compared to $157.3 million in the same 
period 2015. The following table provides a list of the costs and expenses 
incurred for the six months ended June&nbsp;30, 2016 and 2015.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='23',FILE='C:\JMS\109488\16-16099-1\task8056807\16099-1-mo-
09.htm',USER='109488',CD='Aug  9 00:33 2016' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">Costs of Sales</font></i></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">Costs of sales, which are comprised of the cost of 
GEOs purchased under stream agreements, cost of prepaid gold ounces, net 
proceeds taxes on mineral interests, oil&nbsp;&amp; gas production taxes and 
operating costs on oil&nbsp;&amp; gas working interests were $52.1 million for 
the first six months of 2016 compared with $46.4 million for the second quarter 
of 2015.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" width="93%" style="border-
collapse:collapse;margin-left:.25in;">

<td width="52%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:52.32%;">

style="font-size:1.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>    </td>
<td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.68%;">
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font 
size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;font-
weight:bold;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>    </td>
<td width="43%" colspan="8" valign="bottom" style="border:none;border-
bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:43.92%;">

size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:8.0pt;font-

</td>

style="background:#CCEEFF;border:none;border-bottom:double windowtext 
2.25pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:11.66%;">
<p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2"
face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">46.4</font></p>    </td>
<td width="2%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" 
style="background:#CCEEFF;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.68%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>
<td width="1%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" 
style="background:#CCEEFF;border:none;border-bottom:double windowtext 
2.25pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:1.2%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"
style="font-size:10.0pt;">$</font></p>    </td>
<td width="11%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" 
style="background:#CCEEFF;border:none;border-bottom:double windowtext 
2.25pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:11.66%;">
<p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2"
face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">5.7</font></p>    </td>
<td width="1%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" 
style="background:#CCEEFF;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:1.06%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>   </tr>  </table>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">The increase of $5.7 million is attributable to more 
stream ounces delivered pursuant to the various stream agreements in the first 
six months of 2016 when compared to 2015.&#160; The Company was delivered 
156,474 GEOs under its stream agreements during first six months of 2016 
compared to 106,841 GEOs delivered in the first six months of 2015.&#160; 
Oil&nbsp;&amp; Gas operating costs were lower due to production and cost 
efficiencies implemented by the operators.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font 
size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Costs
of Sales Reconciliation &#151; Six Months 2015 to Six Months 2016</font></b></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><i><font 
size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-
style:italic;">(expressed in millions)</font></i></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font 
size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:5.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font 
size="2" face="Times New Roman"><img width="711" height="423" 
src="g160991mo09i003.jpg"></font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-
align:center;">24<a name="PB_24_125249_7056"></a></p>
<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade 
align="left" style="color:#010101;"></div>
</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='24',FILE='C:\JMS\109488\16-16099-1\task8056807\16099-1-mo-
09.htm',USER='109488',CD='Aug  9 00:33 2016' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">Depletion and 
Depreciation</font></i></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">Depletion and depreciation totaled $133.7 million for 
the six months compared to $100.8 million in 2015. The increase of $32.9 million
is due in part to the Antamina acquisition ($20.2 million), the Antapaccay 
acquisition ($17.3 million), and initial depletion for the Karma stream cost due
to the initial deliveries received ($3.2 million).&#160; These increases were 
partially offset by lower depletion on Candelaria and Bald Mountain due to lower
production and on Oil&nbsp;&amp; Gas due to the impact of a weaker Canadian 
dollar relative to the U.S. dollar.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font
size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-
weight:bold;">Depletion Reconciliation &#151; Six Months 2015 to Six Months 
2016</font></b></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><i><font 
size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-
style:italic;">(expressed in millions)</font></i></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font 
size="2" face="Times New Roman"><img width="711" height="386" 
src="g160991mo09i004.jpg"></font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">Corporate 
Administration</font></i></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">Corporate administration expenses increased to $11.1 
million in the first six months of 2016, from $8.2 million in 2015. The increase
is primarily due to higher board of directors&#146; costs as the deferred share 
units earned by board members increased in value during the quarter.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

collapse:collapse;margin-left:.25in;">

face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Other</font></p>    </td>

style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>

<p align="center" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-

align="left" style="color:#010101;"></div>

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='25',FILE='C:\JMS\109488\16-16099-1\task8056807\16099-1-mo-
09.htm',USER='109488',CD='Aug  9 00:33 2016' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">Business Development 
Expenses</font></i></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">Business development expenses reflect an expense of 
$0.6 million due to the capitalization of expenses to the mineral interest 
following the closing of transactions. Timing of incurring these costs typically
varies depending upon the level of activity of the business development team and
the timing of completing transactions.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Foreign Exchange and Other 
Income/Expenses</font></b></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">Foreign exchange losses and other income/expenses were
an income of $6.3 million for 2016 and a loss of $1.2 million for 2015. The 
following table provides a list of foreign exchange income/losses and other 
expenses incurred for the six months ended June&nbsp;30, 2016 and 
2015.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

collapse:collapse;margin-left:.25in;">

face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">6.3</font></p>    </td>
<td width="2%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" 
style="background:#CCEEFF;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.68%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>
<td width="1%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" 
style="background:#CCEEFF;border:none;border-bottom:double windowtext 
2.25pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:1.2%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">$</font></p>    </td>
<td width="11%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" 
style="background:#CCEEFF;border:none;border-bottom:double windowtext 
2.25pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:11.66%;">
<p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2"
face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(1.2</font></p>    </td>
<td width="2%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" 
style="background:#CCEEFF;padding:0in 0in 2.25pt 0in;width:2.68%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">)</font></p>    </td>
<td width="1%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" 
style="background:#CCEEFF;border:none;border-bottom:double windowtext 
2.25pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:1.2%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">$</font></p>    </td>
<td width="11%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" 
style="background:#CCEEFF;border:none;border-bottom:double windowtext 
2.25pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:11.64%;">
<p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2"
face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">7.5</font></p>    </td>
<td width="1%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" 
style="background:#CCEEFF;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:1.06%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>   </tr>  </table>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">Foreign exchange gains and losses include foreign 
exchange movements related to cash and cash equivalents and investments in debt 
securities, such as treasury bills and intercompany loans, held in the parent 
company, which are denominated in either U.S. dollars or Mexican pesos. The 
parent company&#146;s functional currency is the Canadian dollar. Under IFRS, 
all foreign exchange changes related to monetary assets denominated in a 
currency other than the functional currency are recorded in net income as 
opposed to other comprehensive income.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Finance Income and Finance 
Expenses</font></b></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">Finance income was $2.1 million (2015 - $1.9 million) 
for the six months while finance expenses were $2.1 million (2015 - $0.9
million).</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" width="93%" style="border-
collapse:collapse;margin-left:.25in;">

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">Finance income is earned on our cash equivalents 
and/or short-term investments. The increase in finance income is due to finance 
income earned from the True Gold additional financing option under the Karma 
stream agreement.&#160; Interest income in the amount of $1.0 million has been 
accrued in 2016 from the Noront loan.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">Finance expenses increased due to interest expense 
associated with the $460.0 million draw down of the credit facility in Q4 
2015.&#160; In addition to the $0.8 million interest expensed, $0.7 million was 
capitalized to the Cobre Panama stream interest project.&#160; The</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-
align:center;">26<a name="PB_26_130027_5796"></a></p>
<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade 
align="left" style="color:#010101;"></div>
</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='26',FILE='C:\JMS\109488\16-16099-1\task8056807\16099-1-mo-
09.htm',USER='109488',CD='Aug  9 00:33 2016' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">amortization expense relates to amortization of the 
initial set-up costs incurred with respect to the credit facility.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Income Taxes</font></b></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">Franco-Nevada had an income tax expense of $19.4 
million (2015 &#150; $20.3 million) for the six months ended June&nbsp;30, 2016 
comprised of a current income tax expense of $17.1 million (2015 - $13.4 
million) and a deferred income tax expense of $2.3 million (2015 &#150; $6.9 
million) related to our Canadian and Mexican entities.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Net Income</font></b></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">Net income for the first six months was $72.3 million,
or $0.41 per share, compared with a net income of $40.8 million, or $0.26 per 
share, for the same period in 2015. Adjusted Net Income was $68.0 million, or 
$0.39 per share, compared with $45.8 million, or $0.30 per share, for 
2015.&#160; The increase in Adjusted Net Income was driven primarily by higher 
revenue due to recent asset acquisitions.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-
align:center;">27<a name="PB_27_130043_2897"></a></p>
<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade 
align="left" style="color:#010101;"></div>

<td width="12%" colspan="2" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" 
style="background:#CCEEFF;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:12.0%;">
<p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2"
face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">0.14:1</font></p>    </td>
<td width="1%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" 
style="background:#CCEEFF;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:1.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>   </tr>  </table>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Balance Sheet Review</font></b></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">Total assets were $4,209.9 million at June&nbsp;30, 
2016 compared to $3,674.3 million at December&nbsp;31, 2015. Our asset base is 
primarily comprised of non-current assets such as our royalty, stream and 
working interests, and current assets of cash and cash equivalents.&#160; This 
reflects our business strategy of growing a diversified portfolio and ensuring 
cash is available for future acquisitions and dividends. Total liabilities at 
June&nbsp;30, 2016 were $52.0 million including current and deferred income tax 
liabilities.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">FINANCIAL POSITION, LIQUIDITY AND 
CAPITAL RESOURCES</font></b></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">Cash flow generated for the three and six months ended
June&nbsp;30 was as follows:</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

2.25pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:1.12%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">$</font></p>    </td>
<td width="8%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" 
style="background:#CCEEFF;border:none;border-bottom:double windowtext 
2.25pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:8.88%;">
<p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2"
face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">12.3</font></p>    </td>
<td width="2%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF"

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"

<td width="1%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" 
style="background:#CCEEFF;border:none;border-bottom:double windowtext

<p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2"
face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">76.6</font></p>    </td>
<td width="2%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF"

<p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2"
face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">18.3</font></p>    </td>
<td width="1%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" 
style="background:#CCEEFF;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:1.0%;">

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Operating Cash Flow</font></b></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">Cash provided by operating activities after changes in
non-cash assets and liabilities, relating to operating activities, was $82.3 
million and $60.1 million for the three months ended June&nbsp;30, 2016 and 
2015, respectively. Cash provided by operating activities after changes in non-
cash assets and liabilities, relating to operating activities, was $181.4 
million and $129.5 million for the six months ended June&nbsp;30, 2016 and 2015,
respectively. The increases are attributable to higher revenues generated in the
quarter as a result of recent Antamina and Antapaccay mineral stream 
acquisitions.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-
align:center;">28<a name="PB_28_130757_7252"></a></p>
<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade 
align="left" style="color:#010101;"></div>
</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='28',FILE='C:\JMS\109488\16-16099-1\task8056807\16099-1-mo-
11.htm',USER='109488',CD='Aug  9 00:34 2016' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Investing Activities</font></b></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">Cash used in investing activities was $6.9 million for
the quarter compared to $25.8 million in the same period of 2015. The decrease 
was due to the funding of the Cobre Panama stream of $37.7 million being more 
than offset by proceeds from the disposition of investments and gold 
bullion.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">Cash used in investing activities was $488.9 million 
for the six months ended June&nbsp;30, 2016 compared to $46.9 million in the 
same period of 2015. The increase was due to the acquisitions of interests in 
mineral properties in 2016 compared to 2015, in particular the Antapaccay 
acquisition of $500.0 million.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"
style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Financing Activities</font></b></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">Net cash used in financing activities was $23.8 
million for the quarter compared to a use of $24.3 million for 2015.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">Net cash provided by financing activities was $381.6 
million for the first six months of 2016 compared to a use of $47.9 million for 
2015. The increase in cash provided is attributable to the funds raised from the
equity issuance of 19.2 million shares resulting in $883.5 million net proceeds 
to the Company.&#160; This inflow of funds was partially used to repay the 
$460.0 million then drawn on the credit facility.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Cash Resources and 
Liquidity</font></b></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Our performance is impacted by foreign 
currency fluctuations of the Canadian dollar and Australian dollar relative to 
the U.S. dollar. The largest exposure is with respect to the Canadian/U.S. 
dollar exchange rate as we hold a significant amount of our assets in Canada and
report our results in U.S. dollars.&#160; The effect of this volatility in these
currencies against the U.S. dollar impacts our corporate administration, 
business development expenses and depletion on mineral and oil&nbsp;&amp; gas 
interests incurred in our Canadian and Australian entities due to their 
respective functional currencies. The Canadian dollar traded in a range of 
$</font>0.7593 to $0.7972, closing the quarter at $0.7687, and the Australian 
dollar traded between $0.7176 and $0.7801.</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">As at June&nbsp;30, 2016, our cash, cash equivalents 
and short-term investments totaled $225.8 million (December&nbsp;31, 2015 - 
$168.0 million).&#160; In addition, we held investments at June&nbsp;30, 2016 
with a combined value of $123.4 million (December&nbsp;31, 2015 - $94.8 
million), of which $91.4 million was held in publicly traded equity instruments 
(December&nbsp;31, 2015 - $64.6 million).</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">Management&#146;s objectives when managing capital are
to:</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-
indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>ensure the 
preservation and availability of capital by investing in low risk investments 
with high liquidity; and</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-
indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>ensure that
adequate levels of capital are maintained to meet requirements.</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">Franco-Nevada invests its excess funds in term 
deposits, treasury bills of the U.S. government, Canadian federal and provincial
governments and high quality corporate bonds.&#160; As at June&nbsp;30, 2016, 
the majority of funds were held in cash deposits with several financial 
institutions. As at June&nbsp;30, 2016, investments had maturities 
upon</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-
align:center;">29<a name="PB_29_130820_5335"></a></p>
<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade 
align="left" style="color:#010101;"></div>
</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='29',FILE='C:\JMS\109488\16-16099-1\task8056807\16099-1-mo-
11.htm',USER='109488',CD='Aug  9 00:34 2016' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">acquisition of 92 days. Accordingly, as at 
June&nbsp;30, 2016, the investments were classified as short-term 
investments.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">Our near-term cash requirements include funding of the
Cobre Panama commitments, corporate administration costs, certain costs of 
operations, payment of dividends and income taxes directly related to the 
recognition of royalty and stream revenues.&#160; As a royalty/stream company, 
there are limited requirements for capital expenditures other than for the 
acquisition of additional royalties/streams and working interests&#146; capital 
commitments.&#160; Such acquisitions are entirely discretionary and will be 
consummated through the use of cash, as available, or through the issuance of 
common shares or other equity or debt securities or use of our credit facility. 
We believe that our current cash resources, our available credit facility and 
future cash flows will be sufficient to cover the cost of our commitments under 
the various stream agreements, administrative expenses, costs of operations and 
dividend payments for the foreseeable future.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-
align:center;">30<a name="PB_30_130834_5796"></a></p>
<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade 
align="left" style="color:#010101;"></div>

align="left" style="color:black;"></div>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .25in;text-
indent:-.25in;"><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:6.5pt;position:relative;top:-3.0pt;">1</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Subject to an annual 
inflationary adjustment except for Antamina, Karma, Guadalupe, Sabodala and 
Antapaccay.</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .25in;text-
indent:-.25in;"><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:6.5pt;position:relative;top:-3.0pt;">2</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Should the prevailing market 
price for gold be lower than this amount, the per ounce cash payment will be 
reduced to the prevailing market price, with the exception of Palmarejo.</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .25in;text-
indent:-.25in;"><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:6.5pt;position:relative;top:-3.0pt;">3</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Subject to successive 
extensions.</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .25in;text-
indent:-.25in;"><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:6.5pt;position:relative;top:-3.0pt;">4</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Subject to a fixed payability 
of 90%. Percentage decreases to 15.0% after 86,000,000 ounces of silver has been
delivered under the agreement.</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .25in;text-
indent:-.25in;"><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:6.5pt;position:relative;top:-3.0pt;">5</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Purchase price is 5% of the 
average silver price at the time of delivery.</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .25in;text-
indent:-.25in;"><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:6.5pt;position:relative;top:-3.0pt;">6</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Percentage decreases to 40% 
after 720,000 ounces of gold and 12.0 million ounces of silver have been 
delivered under the agreement.</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .25in;text-
indent:-.25in;"><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:6.5pt;position:relative;top:-3.0pt;">7</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Gold deliveries are indexed to 
copper in concentrate produced from the project. 120 ounces of gold per every 1 
million pounds of copper produced until 808,000 ounces of gold delivered. 
Thereafter 81 ounces of gold per 1 million pounds of copper produced to 
1,716,188 ounces of gold delivered, thereafter 63.4% of the gold in 
concentrate.</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .25in;text-
indent:-.25in;"><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:6.5pt;position:relative;top:-3.0pt;">8</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Silver deliveries are indexed 
to copper in concentrate produced from the project. 1,376 ounces of silver per 
every 1 million pounds of copper produced until 9,842,000 ounces of silver 
delivered. Thereafter 1,776 ounces of silver per 1 million pounds of copper 
produced to 29,731,000 ounces of silver delivered, thereafter 62.1% of the 
silver.</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .25in;text-
indent:-.25in;"><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:6.5pt;position:relative;top:-3.0pt;">9</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Gold deliveries are fixed at 
15,000 ounces per annum from June&nbsp;30, 2016 until February&nbsp;28, 2021. 
Thereafter, percentage is 4.875%.</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .25in;text-
indent:-.25in;"><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:6.5pt;position:relative;top:-3.0pt;">10</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160; </font>Purchase price is 20% of the average gold price at the time 
of delivery.</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .25in;text-
indent:-.25in;"><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:6.5pt;position:relative;top:-3.0pt;">11</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160; </font>Agreement is capped at 400,000 ounces of gold.</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .25in;text-
indent:-.25in;"><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:6.5pt;position:relative;top:-3.0pt;">12</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160; </font>Gold deliveries are fixed at 1,875 ounces per month until 
December&nbsp;31, 2019. Thereafter, percentage is 6% of gold produced.</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .25in;text-
indent:-.25in;"><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:6.5pt;position:relative;top:-3.0pt;">13</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160; </font>Purchase price is 20% of prevailing market price at the time 
of delivery.</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .25in;text-
indent:-.25in;"><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:6.5pt;position:relative;top:-3.0pt;">14</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160; </font>Agreement is capped at 312,500 ounces of gold.</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .25in;text-
indent:-.25in;"><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:6.5pt;position:relative;top:-3.0pt;">15</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160; </font>The Company is committed to purchase 50% of the precious 
metals contained in ore from the properties. Cash payment is based on gold 
equivalent ounces.</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .25in;text-
indent:-.25in;"><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:6.5pt;position:relative;top:-3.0pt;">16</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160; </font>Gold deliveries are referenced to copper in concentrate 
shipped with 300 ounces of gold delivered for each 1,000 tonnes of copper in 
concentrate shipped, until 630,000 ounces of gold has been delivered. 
Thereafter, percentage is 30% of gold shipped.</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .25in;text-
indent:-.25in;"><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:6.5pt;position:relative;top:-3.0pt;">17</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160; </font>Silver deliveries are referenced to copper in concentrate 
shipped with 4,700 ounces of silver delivered for each 1,000 tonnes of copper in
concentrate shipped, until 10.0 million ounces of silver has been delivered. 
Thereafter, percentage is 30% of silver shipped.</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .25in;text-
indent:-.25in;"><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:6.5pt;position:relative;top:-3.0pt;">18</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160; </font>Purchase price is 20% of the spot price of gold until 750,000
ounces of gold has been delivered, thereafter the purchase price is 30% of the 
spot price of gold.</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .25in;text-
indent:-.25in;"><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:6.5pt;position:relative;top:-3.0pt;">19</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160; </font>Purchase price is 20% of the spot price of silver until 12.8 
million ounces of silver has been delivered, thereafter the purchase price is 
30% of the spot price of silver.</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-
align:center;">31<a name="PB_31_131044_2897"></a></p>
<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade 
align="left" style="color:#010101;"></div>

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">Cobre Panama Stream 
Agreement</font></i></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">The Company has funding commitments under the Cobre 
Panama stream agreement as described in the <i>Guidance</i> section 
above.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">CAPITAL RESOURCES</font></b></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">As of August&nbsp;8, 2016, an amount of $1.0 billion, 
or its Canadian dollar equivalent, is available under our unsecured credit 
facility.&#160; Advances under the facility bear interest depending upon the 
currency of the advance and leverage ratio.&#160; In 2015, Franco-Nevada 
increased its credit facility from $500.0 million to $1.0 billion and extended 
the maturity to November&nbsp;12, 2020. As of August&nbsp;8, 2016, U.S. and 
Canadian dollar advances under the facility would bear interest rates of 3.95%
and 2.90%, respectively. We can also draw funds using LIBOR 30-day rates plus 
120 basis points under our credit facility.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">Standby fees of $1.0 million (2015 - $0.7 million), 
interest of $0.8 million (2015 - $Nil) and amortization of issuance costs of 
$0.3 million (2015 - $0.2 million) were incurred and paid for the six months 
ended June&nbsp;30, 2016.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">CRITICAL ACCOUNTING 
ESTIMATES</font></b></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">The preparation of consolidated financial statements 
in accordance with IFRS requires the Company to make judgments, estimates and 
assumptions that affect the reported amounts of assets and liabilities and 
disclosures of contingent assets and liabilities at the date of the consolidated
financial statements and the reported amounts of revenues and expenses during 
the reporting period. Estimates and assumptions are continuously evaluated and 
are based on management&#146;s best knowledge of the relevant facts and 
circumstances, having regard to previous experience. However, actual outcomes 
may differ from the amounts included in the consolidated financial 
statements.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">Our significant accounting policies and estimates are 
disclosed in notes 2 and 3 of our most recent annual consolidated financial 
statements.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-
align:center;">32<a name="PB_32_131058_3020"></a></p>

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">NEW ACCOUNTING STANDARDS ISSUED BUT NOT YET 
EFFECTIVE</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">IAS 12 Income Taxes</font></b></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">IAS 12, &#147;Income taxes&#148; (&#147;IAS 12&#148;) 
provides guidance on the recognition of deferred tax assets. In 
January&nbsp;2016, the International Accounting Standards board issued 
amendments to clarify the requirements for recognizing deferred tax assets on 
unrealized losses. The amendments clarify the accounting for deferred tax where 
an asset is measured at fair value and that fair value is below the asset&#146;s
tax base. They also clarify certain other aspects of accounting for deferred tax
assets. The amendments are effective for annual periods beginning on or after 
January&nbsp;1, 2017. </font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">The Company is currently assessing the impact of IAS 
12 on the consolidated financial statements.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">OUTSTANDING SHARE DATA</font></b></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">Franco-Nevada is authorized to issue an unlimited 
number of common and preferred shares.&#160; A detailed description of the 
rights, privileges, restrictions and conditions attached to each class of 
authorized shares is included in our Annual Information Form&nbsp;for the year 
ended December&nbsp;31, 2015, a copy of which can be found on SEDAR at 
www.sedar.com and in our 40-F, a copy of which can be found on EDGAR at 
www.sec.gov.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-
align:center;">33<a name="PB_33_131114_141"></a></p>
