<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font 
size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">FRANCO-NEVADA 
CORPORATION</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font 
size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">CONDENSED NOTES TO 
CONSOLIDATED FINANCIAL STATEMENTS</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font 
size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">FOR THE THREE AND SIX 
MONTHS ENDED JUNE 30, 2016 and 2015</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><i><font 
size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-
style:italic;">(Unaudited, expressed in millions of U.S. dollars except share 
and per share amounts)</font></i></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-
indent:-.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">b)</font></i><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160; </font><i>Dividends</i></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">The Company declared dividends in the amount of $39.3 
million (2015 - $32.5 million), or $0.22 per share (2015 - $0.21 per share) and 
$77.8 million (2015 - $63.6 million), or $0.43 per share (2015 - $0.41 per 
share), in the three and six months ended June&nbsp;30, 3016, respectively. The 
Company paid cash dividends in the amount of $29.2 million (2015 - $23.3 
million) and $57.5 million (2015 - $47.2 million) and issued common shares 
pursuant it its DRIP valued at $10.1 million (2015 - $9.3 million) and $20.3 
million (2015 - $16.5 million), in the three and six months ended June&nbsp;30, 
2016, respectively.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .25in;text-
indent:-.25in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">c)</font></i><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160; </font><i>Stock-based payments</i></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">During the three and six months ended June&nbsp;30, 
2016, an expense of $1.1 million (2015 - $1.3 million) and $2.4 million (2015 - 
$2.7 million) related to stock options and restricted share units has been 
included in corporate administration on the consolidated statements of income.
The Company capitalitalized $0.2 million (2015 -$NIL) and $0.4 million (2015- 
$NIL) to royalty, stream, and working interest, net,&#160; in the three and six 
months ending June&nbsp;30, 2016, respectively.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Note 15 &#151; Earnings per share 
(&#147;EPS&#148;)</font></b></p>

style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

style="background:#CCEEFF;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:1.06%;">

style="font-size:10.0pt;">As at June&nbsp;30, 2016, no stock options (2015 -NIL)
and no warrants (2015 - 6,510,769) were excluded in the computation of diluted 
EPS.&#160; Restricted share units totaling 93,955&#160; (2015 &#150; 85,147) 
were excluded from the computation of diluted EPS for the three and six months 
ended June&nbsp;30, 2016 due to the performance criteria for the vesting of the 
RSUs having not been measurable prior to June&nbsp;30, 2016.</font></p>

<TEXT>
<html>
<head>
</head>
<body link=blue lang="EN-US">
<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">
<p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><b><font 
size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-
weight:bold;">Exhibit&nbsp;99.4</font></b></p>
<p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><b><font 
size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-
weight:bold;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font 
size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-
weight:bold;">FORM&nbsp;52-109F2</font></b></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font 
size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font 
size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-
weight:bold;">CERTIFICATION OF INTERIM FILINGS</font></b></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font 
size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">FULL 
CERTIFICATE</font></b></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">I, David Harquail, President and Chief Executive 
Officer of Franco-Nevada Corporation, certify the following:</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">1. <b><i style="font-weight:bold;">Review: </i></b>I 
have reviewed the interim financial report and interim MD&amp;A (together, the 
&#147;interim filings&#148;) of Franco-Nevada Corporation (the 
&#147;issuer&#148;) for the interim period ended June&nbsp;30, 2016.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">2. <b><i style="font-weight:bold;">No 
misrepresentations: </i></b>Based on my knowledge, having exercised reasonable 
diligence, the interim filings do not contain any untrue statement of a material
fact or omit to state a material fact required to be stated or that is necessary
to make a statement not misleading in light of the circumstances under which it 
was made, with respect to the period covered by the interim filings.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">3. <b><i style="font-weight:bold;">Fair presentation:
</i></b>Based on my knowledge, having exercised reasonable diligence, the 
interim financial report together with the other financial information included 
in the interim filings fairly present in all material respects the financial 
condition, financial performance and cash flows of the issuer, as of the date of
and for the periods presented in the interim filings.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">4. <b><i style="font-weight:bold;">Responsibility: 
</i></b>The issuer&#146;s other certifying officer(s)&nbsp;and I are responsible
for establishing and maintaining disclosure controls and procedures (DC&amp;P) 
and internal control over financial reporting (ICFR), as those terms are defined
in National Instrument 52-109 <i>Certification of Disclosure in Issuers&#146; 
Annual and Interim Filings, </i>for the issuer.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">5. <b><i style="font-weight:bold;">Design: 
</i></b>Subject to the limitations, if any, described in paragraphs 5.2 and 5.3,
the issuer&#146;s other certifying officer(s)&nbsp;and I have, as at the end of 
the period covered by the interim filings;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-
indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>designed 
DC&amp;P, or caused it to be designed under our supervision, to provide 
reasonable assurance that</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 56.7pt;text-indent:-
14.15pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">(i)</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>material 
information relating to the issuer is made known to us by others, particularly 
during the period in which the interim filings are being prepared; and</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade 
align="left" style="color:#010101;"></div>
</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='',FILE='C:\JMS\105568\16-16099-1\task8054847\16099-1-
ms.htm',USER='105568',CD='Aug  6 12:50 2016' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 56.7pt;text-indent:-
14.15pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">(ii)</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>information required to be 
disclosed by the issuer in its annual filings, interim filings or other reports 
filed or submitted by it under securities legislation is recorded, processed, 
summarized and reported within the time periods specified in securities 
legislation; and</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 35.45pt;text-indent:-14.15pt;"><font size="2" 
face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(b)&nbsp;designed ICFR, or 
caused it to be designed under our supervision, to provide reasonable assurance 
regarding the reliability of financial reporting and the preparation of 
financial statements for external purposes in accordance with the issuer&#146;s
GAAP.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .25in;text-indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" 
face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">5.1 <b><i style="font-
weight:bold;">Control framework: </i></b>The control framework the issuer&#146;s
other certifying officer and I used to design the issuer&#146;s ICFR is Internal
Control &#151; Integrated Framework published by the Committee of Sponsoring 
Organizations of the Treadway Commission (&#147;COSO&#148;).</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">5.2 N/A</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">5.3 N/A</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">6. <b><i style="font-weight:bold;">Reporting changes 
in ICFR: </i></b>The issuer has disclosed in its interim MD&amp;A any change in 
the issuer&#146;s ICFR that occurred during the period beginning on April 1, 
2016 and ended on June&nbsp;30, 2016 that has materially affected, or is 
reasonably likely to materially affect, the issuer&#146;s ICFR.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<TYPE>EX-99.5
<SEQUENCE>6
<FILENAME>a16-16099_1ex99d5.htm
<DESCRIPTION>EX-99.5
<TEXT>
<html>
<head>
</head>
<body link=blue lang="EN-US">
<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">
<p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><b><font 
size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-
weight:bold;">Exhibit&nbsp;99.5</font></b></p>
<p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><b><font 
size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-
weight:bold;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font 
size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-
weight:bold;">FORM&nbsp;52-109F2</font></b></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font 
size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font 
size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-
weight:bold;">CERTIFICATION OF INTERIM FILINGS</font></b></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font 
size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">FULL 
CERTIFICATE</font></b></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">I, Sandip Rana, Chief Financial Officer of Franco-
Nevada Corporation, certify the following:</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">1. <b><i style="font-weight:bold;">Review: </i></b>I 
have reviewed the interim financial report and interim MD&amp;A (together, the 
&#147;interim filings&#148;) of Franco-Nevada Corporation (the 
&#147;issuer&#148;) for the interim period ended June 30, 2016.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">2. <b><i style="font-weight:bold;">No 
misrepresentations: </i></b>Based on my knowledge, having exercised reasonable 
diligence, the interim filings do not contain any untrue statement of a material
fact or omit to state a material fact required to be stated or that is necessary
to make a statement not misleading in light of the circumstances under which it 
was made, with respect to the period covered by the interim filings.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">3. <b><i style="font-weight:bold;">Fair presentation: 
</i></b>Based on my knowledge, having exercised reasonable diligence, the 
interim financial report together with the other financial information included 
in the interim filings fairly present in all material respects the financial 
condition, financial performance and cash flows of the issuer, as of the date of
and for the periods presented in the interim filings.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">4. <b><i style="font-weight:bold;">Responsibility: 
</i></b>The issuer&#146;s other certifying officer(s)&nbsp;and I are responsible
for establishing and maintaining disclosure controls and procedures (DC&amp;P) 
and internal control over financial reporting (ICFR), as those terms are defined
in National Instrument 52-109 <i>Certification of Disclosure in Issuers&#146; 
Annual and Interim Filings, </i>for the issuer.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">5. <b><i style="font-weight:bold;">Design: 
</i></b>Subject to the limitations, if any, described in paragraphs 5.2 and 5.3,
the issuer&#146;s other certifying officer(s)&nbsp;and I have, as at the end of 
the period covered by the interim filings;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-
indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>designed 
DC&amp;P, or caused it to be designed under our supervision, to provide 
reasonable assurance that</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 56.7pt;text-indent:-
14.15pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">(i)</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>material 
information relating to the issuer is made known to us by others, particularly 
during the period in which the interim filings are being prepared; and</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade 
align="left" style="color:#010101;"></div>
</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='',FILE='C:\JMS\105568\16-16099-1\task8054847\16099-1-
mu.htm',USER='105568',CD='Aug  6 12:52 2016' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 56.7pt;text-indent:-
14.15pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">(ii)</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>information required to be 
disclosed by the issuer in its annual filings, interim filings or other reports 
filed or submitted by it under securities legislation is recorded, processed, 
summarized and reported within the time periods specified in securities 
legislation; and</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 35.45pt;text-indent:-14.15pt;"><font size="2" 
face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(b)&nbsp;designed ICFR, or 
caused it to be designed under our supervision, to provide reasonable assurance 
regarding the reliability of financial reporting and the preparation of 
financial statements for external purposes in accordance with the issuer&#146;s 
GAAP.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .25in;text-indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" 
face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">5.1<b><i style="font-
weight:bold;"> Control framework: </i></b>The control framework the 
issuer&#146;s other certifying officer and I used to design the issuer&#146;s 
ICFR is Internal Control &#151; Integrated Framework published by the Committee 
of Sponsoring Organizations of the Treadway Commission 
(&#147;COSO&#148;).</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">5.2 N/A</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">5.3 N/A</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">6. <b><i style="font-weight:bold;">Reporting changes 
in ICFR: </i></b>The issuer has disclosed in its interim MD&amp;A any change in 
the issuer&#146;s ICFR that occurred during the period beginning on 
April&nbsp;1, 2016 and ended on June 30, 2016 that has materially affected, or 
is reasonably likely to materially affect, the issuer&#146;s ICFR.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
